name: Frog vs Flies
description:
This was a game produced for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, where the theme was 'Out of Control', built in the Godot engine.

Controls:

- Move with the ARROW KEYS (jump with UP and drop down with DOWN)

- Eat flies with SPACE

You play as a frog trapped in a terrarium, where a steady buffet of flies flowing in quickly changes from a blessing to a curse, as they start streaming in and taking over.

The more flies there are in the terrarium, the less health you'll have - and so you need to eat as many as you can, without them causing too much of a swarm - and being, well, out of control!

**As with the previous game jam submissions I've made, there are lots of improvements that I'd love to make if I had the time, including:

- powerups/healing items

- sorting out the collision boxes for the tongue/flies (I'm sorry, it will be infuriating)

- animations (including the flies, jumping, atmospheric such as leaves moving)

- better pathfinding for the flies etc

And so on...**

I ultimately chose to test out importing watercolours as assets in preparation for some longer term projects I'm working on at the moment, so a lot of lessons were learnt!

Thanks for reading/hopefully playing!

Sounds used with many thanks to:

https://freesound.org/people/heymanzzzz/sounds/464731/

https://freesound.org/people/sheriff/sounds/456075/
